title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.12 - Employment records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.12 - Employment records

State Regulations

The records access officer shall maintain a record setting
forth the name, public office address, title and salary of every officer and
employee of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
5.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
